name: SysML v2 Action Extraction
description: Extract action definitions with their input and output parameters.

evaluation.rubric: The response must be valid JSON containing an array of action definition objects. Each object must have 'name', 'inputs', and 'outputs' fields. The model contains 3 action definitions: VehicleStartSignal, VehicleOnSignal, and VehicleOffSignal. All three are simple action definitions with no input or output parameters, so 'inputs' and 'outputs' arrays should be empty for each. Score based on: (1) Valid JSON array structure, (2) All 3 action definitions included, (3) Correct empty arrays for inputs/outputs, (4) No fabricated parameters.
